attr.title: Deep Rune
attr.desc: A side-scrolling adventure game that seamlessly blends RPG mechanics and puzzle solving, all set in a mysterious world rooted in Norse mythology. Inspired by King's Field, Tower of the Sorcerer, and DROD RPG.
attr.inst: Download the game for free at https://jc-bailey.itch.io/deep-rune, extract it, and copy the game files to the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game for free at [https://jc-bailey.itch.io/deep-rune](https://jc-bailey.itch.io/deep-rune), extract it, and copy the game files to the port's `gamedata` folder.
